content: introducing the echoes pullover a cozy and colorful sister design to the beloved echoes cardigan this pullover features the same stunning color-changing mandala yarn creating a unique and vibrant look with every stitch designed for comfort and style it has a relaxed fit a beautiful pop of texture and an effortless drape whether you re lounging at home or heading out the echoes pullover is a perfect layering piece for any season plus with an included video tutorial you ll have all the guidance you need to bring this gorgeous design to life this pattern is free on my blog 1 this pattern is available as a kit with lion brand 2 the kit comes with all the yarn needed to make your pullover plus a free copy of the printable pdf pattern download a full video tutorial is included in the pattern 3 1 https //www eandpcrochet com/the-echoes-pullover-crochet-pattern/ 2 http //shrsl com/4ukxt 3 https //youtu be/kys7jlvhhnk
